section.name: Roadmap
section.p: After its release under an open source license the main purpose of its developers is to receive feedback on its conventions. Once those conventions are consolidated version 1.0 will be released
In the meanwhile we have several features in mind. We expect most of them to be finished in the first half of 2005.

section.name: Planned features
section.p: The first planned features are to solve the currently known limitations of the support of XML files with respecto to the configuration through property files. These are:

ul.li: You can only have one XML file per component
There is no complete support for changing XML configuration when aggregating components. Only that offered by variables
There is no complete support for changing XML configuration for each differnt environment. Only that offered by variables.

section.p: Other planned features for XML files are:

ul.li: Storage of XML files in a database

section.p: Implement the servlet interface and fix it by including Jakarta Commons Configuration v1.1 when it is released.
